posts.post_content:
ALL SOLD - thanks for the inquiries.  



All prices are shipped.  Payment by standard paypal preferred.  

All cards are SGC-40 with clean, problem free backs.  Some cards were crossed over from PSA -- for these cards, I have indicated what their grades were and will include the PSA flip with the card.  

I will be out today but will respond Sunday.

thank-you!
